update queue_cmcc_his set tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where queue_id = #{queueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql:
from queue_cmcc_his where 0=0
and tel like concat(#{condition.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time>=str_to_date(#{condition.startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and create_time<=str_to_date(#{condition.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
